summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. The invoice details the charges, discounts, and payment information related to a shipment made on January 28, 2005, with a total amount due of $18.60.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the FedEx services.

events.title: FedEx Shipment
events.description: A shipment was picked up by FedEx on January 28, 2005, for which the invoice is generated.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: The invoice number is 7-995-13549, dated February 7, 2005.
The total charges for the shipment amount to $18.60.
The shipment was picked up on January 28, 2005, and delivered by January 31, 2005.
The invoice indicates a discount of $5.21 applied to the total charges.
The document contains multiple references to Jeffrey Epstein's address in New York.
